title: Farm Animals
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Farm Animals is a simple book that introduces seven charming farm animals, most of which will be familiar to the reader. The playful illustrations support one-to-one picture to text correspondence.
